net.jforum

Class ConfigLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jforum.ConfigLoader

  • public class ConfigLoader
extends Object
    General utilities methods for loading configurations for JForum.
    Author:
    Rafael Steil

    • Method Detail

      • startSystemglobals

        public static void startSystemglobals(String appPath)
        Start ( or restart ) SystemGlobals. This method loads all configuration keys set at SystemGlobals.properties, <user.name>.properties and database specific stuff.
        Parameters:
        appPath - The application root's directory

      • loadModulesMapping

        public static Properties loadModulesMapping(String baseConfigDir)
        Loads module mappings for the system.
        Parameters:
        baseConfigDir - The directory where the file modulesMapping.properties is.
        Returns:
        The java.util.Properties instance, with the loaded modules

      • createLoginAuthenticator

        public static void createLoginAuthenticator()

      • loadUrlPatterns

        public static void loadUrlPatterns()
        Load url patterns. The method tries to load url patterns from WEB-INF/config/urlPattern.properties

      • listenForChanges

        public static void listenForChanges()
        Listen for changes in common configuration files. The watched files are: generic_queries.sql, <database_name>.sql, SystemGlobals.properties and <user.name>.properties
